attributes.action: Review the Housing Act  to provide "freedom of choice" in the contracted arrangements between tenants and landlords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a situation where there is oversupply on the private rented sector, it would introduce flexibility and "enchanced product quality" were it legally possible for landlords and tenants to freely contract tenancy agreements to pre 1986 secure tenancy standards.
